title: Thalmor Movements in Solitude
body: A new envoy has arrived at the Blue Palace. Keep your ears open.

title: Sanctuary Breached
body: The Dawnstar Sanctuary has been compromised. We move to the shadows once again.

title: Goldenglow Job Completed
body: The estate is in flames. Maven will be pleased... eventually.

title: Daedric Whisper
body: The Night Mother speaks. Blood must flow.

title: Storms Over the Sea of Ghosts
body: Ships bound for Windhelm lost to the ice. Trade routes frozen.

title: Word of Power Unearthed
body: Another wall uncovered. The voice grows stronger.

title: Imperial Pressure Mounting
body: The Empire demands we bend the knee. We shall not.

title: Disappearance in Markarth
body: A nobleman vanished near the old Dwemer ruins. Locals suspect the Forsworn.

title: Blades Ready
body: If the Dragonborn is ready, so are we.

title: Dragons Circling Sky Haven
body: We've seen shadows in the sky. The Blades are on high alert.

title: No Rest in the Crypt
body: The dead in Hillgrund’s Tomb are restless again.

title: Magic Gone Awry
body: A student turned half the library into skeevers. Again.

title: Sabotage at the Meadery
body: Someone poisoned the Black-Briar vats. Investigation underway.

title: Scroll Fragment Discovered
body: A fragment of an Elder Scroll has been uncovered in Blackreach.

title: Hunter or Hunted?
body: A vampire lord walks the land. Mortals are mere cattle.

title: Cold Wind from the South
body: Something stirs near the Pale Pass. Old magic, unfamiliar to the Reach.

title: Moon Sugar Shipment Arrived
body: Keep it quiet. The Khajiit won’t be pleased if this leaks.

title: Trouble from the East
body: The Dunmer refugees bring more than stories. Disease, maybe worse.

title: Azura's Vision
body: The stars have shifted. A prophecy draws near.

title: Oblivion Stirs
body: Mehrunes Dagon whispers in dreams. The blade must be reforged.
